授業目的: Students will be introduced to a wide range of communication strategies at the basic level.
到達目標: Building upon English learned in high school, students will engage in more challenging speaking tasks based on the topics listed in the syllabus. More emphasis is placed on the exchange of useful information and opinions.
授業の概要・背景: The course is based on gaining experience with typical topics of conversation, and enabling students to express their own life experiences in English.
授業方法: 対面授業 in computer room using Moodle. On-demand format is available for approved students (unavoidable absence). Please meet in the classroom each class. Each semester will cover 6 units, with each unit taking two classes. Exercises are completed on Moodle and Publisher website (Oxford Online Practice and On the Move). 2 Review tests online will evaluate students acquisition of the topic contents, vocabulary, structure, and conversation ability.
